rationale: Assessed as Vulnerable due to an inferred population decline of greater than 30% over the past ten years.  This is as a result of habitat degradation and water pollution within the Kapuas River basin.
assessor: Jenkins, A., Kullander, F.F. & Tan, H.H.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
